tweakPrompt: hämta data om arbetsannonser som Randek har haft från vår db, summera sen per år och per yrkeskategori/grupp

input.query: SELECT * FROM job_postings WHERE organization_number = '556399-7146' ORDER BY published_date DESC

SELECT 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM publication_date) as year,
  occupation_label,
  COUNT(*) as antal_annonser
FROM job_postings 
WHERE employer_name ILIKE '%Randek%'
GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM publication_date), occupation_label
ORDER BY year DESC, antal_annonser DESC

SELECT 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM publication_date) as year,
  COUNT(*) as totalt_antal_annonser
FROM job_postings 
WHERE employer_name ILIKE '%Randek%'
GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM publication_date)
ORDER BY year DESC
